description: A typical restaurant in the province of Brescia not far from Lake Garda, Villa Aurora serves Italian cuisine with an equal focus on meat and fish dishes, as well as a few traditional specialities with a light modern twist. A bastion of local cuisine, the restaurant is run by a welcoming and experienced family. Don’t miss the desserts!
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
